inter_groups: Un membre de notre conseil d'administration travaille pour "Anti-Racism and Diversity Intergroup" au Parlement européen

subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

relevant_communication:
Presentation on the intersection of Women's Rights and Freedom of Religion or Belief at the Women in Faith Roundtable II in Brussels 
(24.01.2018) 
 
Presentation of a paper on the role of FECRIS in Russia at a conference organized by F.O.B. in Firenze (19.01.2018) 
 
Presentation at a side-event at the UN Universal Periodic Review of France in Geneva (15.01.2018) 
 
Publication of an article about the Chinese refugees from the Church of Almighty God in Europe in The Parliament Magazine online (09.01.2018) 
 
Participation at the OSCE 'Human Rights Communication 2.0' capacity building workshop, Budapest (05-07.12.2017) 
 
Presentation on the deportation of religious leaders as a counter-radicalisation policy at 'Radicalization and Violent Extremism: Focus on Prevention', Brussels (05.12.2017)  
 
Video interview by EUReporter about the Belgian parliamentary report on Islamic radicalism and radicalization of Islam (29.11.2017)  
 
Presentation at the European Parliament about the Belgian parliamentary report on radicalism and violent radicalism (29.11.2017)  
 
Published Op-ed about the European Arrest Warrant in The Parliament Magazine (16.11.2017) 
 
Written submissions sent and active participation in the EEAS preparatory meeting for EU - Kazakhstan Human Rights Dialogue 
(10.11.2017)  
 
Participation in a side-event for the UPR of the Czech Republic at the UN in Geneva (06.11.2017) 
 
Participation in the OSCE/ODIHR HDIM with statements and presentation in a side-event panel discussion Warsaw, Poland (11.09 - 22.09.2017) 
 
Participation in the Africa-EU Civil Society Forum Tunis, Tunisia (11.07-13.07.2017)  
 
Written submission sent to the United Nations Universal Periodic Review on Romania (29.06.2017) 
 
Organisation of a conference entitled "Freedom of Religion or Belief in the Horn of Africa & Egypt" at the European Parliament with MEP Tomas Zdechovsky (28.06.2017) 
 
Written submissions sent and active participation in the EEAS preparatory meeting for EU-China Human Rights Dialogue 
(19.06.2017)  
 
HRWF expert, Hans Noot, participates in FoRB Training for EEAS officers (19.06.2017) 
 
Co-Organisation of "Freedom of Religion in Russia" event at the European Parliament (06.06.2017) 
 
Written submissions sent and active participation in the EEAS preparatory meeting for EU-Kyrgyzstan Human Rights Dialogue 
(23.05.2017)  
 
Advocacy Officer, Lea Perekrests, presents report "North Korean Overseas Workers in Africa" at the Leiden Asia Centre in The Hague (19.05.2017) 
 
Panel Participation of HRWF Advocacy Officer, Lea Perekrests, at "Africa, Development, Freedom of Religion or Belief" (02.05.2017) 
 
Panel Participation of HRWF Advocacy Officer, Lea Perekrests, at the World Congress for North Korean Defectors (25.04.2017) 
 
Written submissions sent and active participation in the EEAS preparatory meeting for EU-Turkmenistan Human Rights dialogue (27.03.2017) 
  
Organization of a conference about human rights in North Korea at the European Parliament (22.03.2017) 
 
Publication of an 8-page Supplement to the Parliament Magazine about the European Arrest Warrant (20.03.2017) 
 
Publication of an article in The Parliament Magazine: High alert for human rights protection in the future in the UK and beyond (11.03.2017) 
 
Co-sponsoring a side-event at the UN in Geneva on women's and children's rights in North Korea (10.03.2017) 
 
 
Report by EUReporter about HRWF's call for adoption of judicial reform in Albania (24.02.2017) 
 
Coverage of HRWF roundtable by EUReporter, EU TODAY, The Parliament Magazine and Voxbox (08.02.2017) 
 
Organizing a roundtable about the European Arrest Warrant at the European Parliament with MEP Hannu Takkula (07.02.2017) 
 
Interviews by EUReporter (Brussels) and Bursa (Bucharest) about the detention conditions in Romania (25.01.2017)
goals__remit: Promotion de la démocratie, de l'état de droit et des droits humains par l'organisation de missions sur le terrain, la publication de rapports, la tenue de conférences et de tables rondes au Parlement européen.
